Strong story line, talented actors, clever directing. And best of all, beautiful scenery and costumes. Cannot wait for next season! I wish some of the actors would take classes but the deep South is the most charming part of the whole show.. Predictable and kind of smarmy plot but it drags you ... Aquaman Science Fiction, Adventure, Intense, Outrageous ['Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis - and the surface world - from his power-hungry brother.'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['James Wan'], 'Producers': ['Rob Cowan', 'Peter Safran'], 'Starring': ['Jason Momoa', 'Amber Heard', 'Willem Dafoe']} Zero acting all video game graphics.
I want those two and a half hours of my life back:( Don’t bother watching {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Clint Eastwood'], 'Producers': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Arnold Stiefel'], 'Starring': ['Kevin Spacey', 'John Cusack', 'Jack Thompson'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} I absolutely love this movie. It’s great fun to show at a Halloween party. Kevin Spacey at his best! Love this film {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jon Amiel'], 'Producers': ['Sean Connery', 'Rhonda Tollefson', 'Michael Hertzberg'], 'Starring': ['Sean Connery', 'Catherine Zeta-Jones', 'Ving Rhames'], 'Studio': ['20th Century Fox']} Not much more to say than Sean Connery… I would happily watch him just read the newspaper:)
It’s a delight to watch him age so elegantly. What a fine actor. Love the setting of his castle in Scotland in the beginning. Good film {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kenny Ortega'], 'Producers': ['David Kirschner', 'Steven Haft'], 'Starring': ['Bette Midler', 'Sarah Jessica Parker', 'Kathy Najimy'], 'Studio': ['Walt Disney Pictures']} Good Halloween fun, Too bad a glorifies bullies at the beginning but it all ends well Good Halloween fun The Ugly Truth Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD {} Bought this film for my sister she had never seen it. Perfect birthday gift it’s definitely a good belly laugh Great fun
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Content Preference**: Enjoys well-produced remakes of classic series and is receptive to newer content, even if predictable. Values engaging alternatives that enhance social experiences, as evident from positive feedback on seasonal entertainment, particularly for its lighthearted fun.
- **Storytelling**: Prioritizes strong narratives and character development, becoming increasingly critical of clichés and sentimental tropes, indicating a desire for depth and engagement in storytelling.
- **Acting Quality**: Holds a significant appreciation for talented performances, particularly favoring seasoned actors like Sean Connery for their captivating skills.
- **Direction**: Values clever directing while remaining critical of execution; attentive to how direction shapes storytelling quality.
- **Aesthetic Appeal**: Enthusiastic about beautiful settings, especially reminiscent of the Deep South and elegant landscapes like Scottish castles, which enhance the viewing experience.
- **Engagement**: Eager for new seasons and current narratives, showcasing a balance between enjoyment and critical scrutiny, especially for films that successfully blend quality and entertainment.
- **Language & Accessibility**: Prefers English audio and subtitles, emphasizing a focus on accessibility and engagement with content.

Recent interactions indicate the user also enjoys lighthearted comedies and values the film's ability to provide laughter and social enjoyment, reflecting a broader appreciation for diverse genres that contribute to shared experiences.
